actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Energy Department.

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to make annual determinations under 46 (f)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the sufficiency of domestic gas supply.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to make annual determinations relating to the sufficiency of the domestic natural gas supply. (Present law authorizes such determinations for purposes of the investment tax credit with respect to public utility property.)

titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to make annual determinations under 46 (f)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the sufficiency of domestic gas supply.
